title: Ep 65: Living off the Grid
description: What does it take to live off the grid? And why do so many off the gridders choose Alaska? My friend Joe tells me all about the off the grid lifestyle - the pros and cons and we get super deep on life. Is living away from society really the answer to all my problems?
author: nadav@ymhstudios.com (Christina Pazsitzky)
